description: Get game-by-game logs for a team or league within a date range

date_from.description: Start date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. If None, starts from season beginning.
date_from.title: Date From

date_to.description: End date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format. If None, includes through season end.
date_to.title: Date To

team.description: Team name or abbreviation. If None, returns logs for all teams.
team.title: Team

title: get_date_range_game_log_or_team_game_log
x-returns: Detailed game logs with stats, outcomes, and matchups
